required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: HCV RNA Fingerstick Assay as Useful Point of Care of Diagnostic Tool for Drug Users in Brussels
clinical_study.official_title: Using the Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick Test as a Diagnostic Tool for Chronic Hepatitis C Among Drug Users in Brussels

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this study is to assess the interest (linkage to care) of the Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick test in Brussels among drug users or former users in contact with the Réseau Hépatite C Bruxelles organization through different partners of this network.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of interest and impact of this new method by the number of participants tested in outreach approaches
primary_outcome.time_frame: 2 years after the start of recruitment

secondary_outcome.measure: Acceptability by the participants of the use of the Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick
secondary_outcome.description: The participants will answer to a qualitative questionnaire about the Cepheid device and will give their preference between the Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL test to routine venous tests

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with a positive HCV RNA test with Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick who will be taken in charge by hepatologist
Number of participants with a positive HCV RNA test with Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick who will initiate a anti-viral treatment
Number of participants with a positive HCV RNA test with Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick who have a Sustained Virological Response (SVR) at 12 weeks after the end of treatment
Time between a positive HCV RNA test with Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick and the initiation of antiviral treatment
Time between a positive HCV RNA test with Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick and a recovery defined by a Sustained Virological Response (SVR)

arm_group.arm_group_label: (Ex) Drug users recognized at-risk population of infection with Hepatitis C virus

intervention.description: The participants will have a molecular test (GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick, Cepheid) that quantifies hepatitis C virus (HCV) RNA levels directly from a fingerstick blood sample.
intervention.arm_group_label: (Ex) Drug users recognized at-risk population of infection with Hepatitis C virus

study_pop.textblock: All marginalized (ex) drug users with a positive serology (for HCV) without a confirmed diagnosis of chronic hepatitis C, who are in contact with the Réseau Hépatite C Bruxelles organization and other front-line partners in Brussels

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- (ex) drug users
- a risk of Hepatitis C infection
- French speaking
- Either patient with a positive serology for HCV who have never performed HCV RNA by Polymerase chain reaction (PCR) by a peripheral venous sampling (due to difficult venous access, financial problem, medical insurance problem or other reasons) either patient with a suspicion of reinfection for whom the HCV RNA PCR by peripheral venous sampling is not reimbursed by health insurance
Exclusion Criteria:
- Age <18 years
- Cepheid GeneXpert HCV VL Fingerstick will not use to assess the Sustained Virological Response (SVR) at 12 weeks after the end of an antiviral treatment
